titles.title: To protect elections for public office by providing financial support and enhanced security for the infrastructure used to carry out such elections, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
